short_summary: Experiential Marketing Campaign seeks to create interactive experiences for International Experience Canada target audiences
description: The objective of this work is to develop and implement an experiential marketing approach for International Experience Canada (IEC) The aim is to create interactive experiences that engage with both outbound (Canadian) and inbound (foreign international) target audiencesThe weighting of the focus of this work will be 70% to outbound (i.e. Canadian youth) and 30% to inbound (foreign youth) audiences Additionally, the inbound element of this project will be a fully virtual component The primary goals are to increase awareness, enhance engagement, drive participation in the IEC program and establish strategic partnerships to amplify the reach and impact of marketing efforts
full_summary:
================
**International Experience Canada Experiential Marketing Campaign**
===========================================
**Tender Title (English)**: International Experience Canada Experiential Marketing Campaign
**Tender Title (French)**: Campagne de marketing expérientiel pour Expérience Internationale Canada

**Reference Number**: CB-889-27768925
**Solicitation Number**: CIC-157511
**Publication Date**: March 6, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: April 9, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
**Tender Status**: Expired

**Background**
-------------

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) Communications Branch is seeking a Contractor to develop and implement an experiential marketing approach for International Experience Canada (IEC). The project aims to create interactive experiences engaging both Canadian (outbound) and foreign international youth (inbound).

**Objective**
------------

The primary objective is to increase awareness, enhance engagement, drive participation in the IEC program, and establish strategic partnerships to amplify marketing efforts. The proposed approach will focus on 70% outbound (Canadian youth) and 30% inbound (foreign youth) audiences, with the inbound element being a fully virtual component.

**Tender Notice**
-----------------

IRCC is seeking proposals from qualified Contractors for the development and implementation of an experiential marketing approach. The tender notice includes the Request for Proposal (RFP) document, Q&A's, and amendment documents.

**Attachments**
---------------

The following attachments are available:

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33636/rfp_experiential_marketing_campaign---157511---amd001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33636/rfp_experiential_marketing_campaign---157511---amd001.pdf)
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33636/qas-cic-157511---round-2_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33636/qas-cic-157511---round-2_0.pdf)
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33636/qas-cic-157511---round-3.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca
